name: Winter for the Fire God
description:
Game submission for NotMoe GameJam#2

For use with Xbox Controller, If you are using a mouse and keyboard, Left mouse button is axe chop, 'x' is interact key, WASD movement.

Xbox Controls, Left analog movement, X is chop, B is interact.

The Fire God, Ignis is under your care throughout the Winter. Deliver him the items you get from chopping down trees. Each day, Ignis prefers something more than others, when you give him stuff he rewards you with 'Favor'. With enough Favor you can upgrade your axe damage and backpack capacity.
